message: What's the story of this group ?

data.message:
who's founders ? and the idea of it ? 
a friend invite me here and talk me about it 

but i am very interested to know more ..
e2ra el posts wenta htgm3 el mwdo3 :D
Abdallah Hodieb i read it, but i am interested to know the founders

Mohamed Alaa El Din created the group. He invited his old colleagues from SilverKey Technologies who were now working in several different countries (including Egypt still), and we were encouraged to add other people we recognized as trusted gurus, all to be admins. The mix was quite unique compared to other technical groups on facebook, and so was the content shared.

Eventually new members became regular members and admins, and the bar is staying as high as we can keep it although we don't prevent people like students etc to come in and those sometimes have, well, different topics and questions, because you never know who's going to,be great asset (some students like Eslam Hamouda are very valuable for example), and we also try to be more open than conservative.
Mohamed Meligy Thanks :) That i was search about ..

We just wanted a place were we can geek out, and share some thoughts and useful stuff too, with a bit of moderation on non-technical\advertising or super newbie topic that we think other places are better at.

Hi أنس موسى 

The reason of this group is mainly to share our knowledge we are a bunch of geeks who used to work together back in Egypt and we have a lot of fun and a lot of sharing information between us.

We used to have a Yahoo Group (Only SilverKey Guys remember these days) and Mohamed Elsherif Has Ask Developer Podcast Domain and we wanted to do something. then he moved to Microsoft, Mohamed Meligy Moved to Emirates then to Australia and wanted to keep the same group/attitude active. I started the Group with the help of all the SK People and we started to share our knowledge between us and sharing interesting links and information. 

Then we started to accept and invite close people who we know and they are interesting in the same type of information.

Mohamed Elsherif Also Started the Egyptian Geek Hangout we try to be different in our activities as we don't find any other Arabic source to help Developers or Students in Egypt.

We always try to keep the quality of the Group, Help Each others and Most important Connecting Geeks in a clean way without SPAM or Ads.

I would also be more than happy to answer any question you might have.

And welcome to our Group.
Mohamed.
Alaa New Active Experienced Users are illegible to be Admins. We always value people participation in our little community :) So you are more than welcome to prove you deserve to be an Admin. :)

We have a flat structure. Admins are people who help keeping up the community, making sure we maintain the same quality and most important fighting spam once in a while. So the right answer is:

Everyone knows what he has to do there is no Super Duper Admin :) If you are and admin you want to get the best out of the community so you will do all your best to keep the community running in the right direction.
